alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Paulding, southwestern DeKalb, northern Fayette, southwestern Cobb, Douglas, central Henry, southwestern Fulton and Clayton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from Kirkwood to near Sweetwater Creek State Park to near New Georgia, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, McDonough, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, Villa Rica, College Park, Powder Springs, Fairburn, Tyrone, Austell, Morrow, Lovejoy and Hapeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton
